description: I like it a lot. I use it for health, fitness and diet

This application works just fine for keeping a personal journal. I like all of its features. However, I would appreciate implementation of a header bar to give it more of a GNOME 3.22 look and feel. I would also appreciate more flexible import formats (e.g. one big diary file). In addition, I haven't figured out how to get links to work. This means that either there's a glitch or that the design isn't clear enough on how to make a link clickable.

Overall, the formatting, jumping to certain dates, etc. are very handy. Unfortunately I cannot say the same for the search function. A more useful alternative is "grep --color=AUTO 'string' ~/diary/*".Much better than using a text editor.
summary: Good app, but could use more development and documentation

description:
basic set of features to write but that is ok
what is not OK is that one cannot really setup encryption on Ubuntu18. It goes so far to create new key (good) but then this key cannot be used.
summary: Quite OK but not fully functional
